definitions: in a way that is visible to the eye

examples.text: the defendant paled visibly as the guilty verdict was announced
she stretched out a visibly shaking hand

shortDefinitions: in way that is visible to eye

definitions: in a way that can be perceived or noticed easily; clearly

examples.text: he was visibly irritated at the way he had been undermined

shortDefinitions: in way that can be perceived or noticed easily
